mapper.sql:
clinical_attribute_meta.ATTR_ID AS "${prefix}attrId", cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER AS "${prefix}cancerStudyIdentifier"
, clinical_attribute_meta.DISPLAY_NAME AS "${prefix}displayName", clinical_attribute_meta.DESCRIPTION AS "${prefix}description", clinical_attribute_meta.DATATYPE AS "${prefix}datatype", clinical_attribute_meta.PATIENT_ATTRIBUTE AS "${prefix}patientAttribute", clinical_attribute_meta.PRIORITY AS "${prefix}priority", clinical_attribute_meta.CANCER_STUDY_ID AS "${prefix}cancerStudyId"
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM clinical_attribute_meta
INNER JOIN cancer_study ON clinical_attribute_meta.CANCER_STUDY_ID = cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_ID WHERE cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER = #{studyId}
